name: Spring Eternal
description:
NOTE: If you have a Windows machine it's highly recommended you download the desktop version (download below), as it has better performance. The browser version above is for those who are running Mac/Linux, or are otherwise unable to play locally.

Made in a week for Riggy2k3's "Dependable Friend" Jam

A young man wakes up with amnesia in a zombie-ridden facility. Attached to his person is a mysterious note informing him that someone very important is in the building and he must save them.

Spring Eternal is a zombie survival-horror game that was inspired by classic RPG Maker horror games like CORPSE-PARTY. It was also influecned by other inspirations such as Resident Evil, Half-Life, Dead of the Brain series for PC-98, as well as the graphical masterpieces of the pre-rendered era (FF7-9, Saga Frontier, etc).

Key Controls

  • Movement:   Arrow keys
  • Action/OK:   Z, Enter, Space
  • Menu/Cancel:   X, Esc
  • Toggle Fullscreen:   F4
  • Video Options: F5

Game Pad Controls

  • Movement:   D-pad
  • Action/Ok:   B
  • Menu/Cancel:   A

 

-= Credits =-

Game design and story by Tony Michael Head

GFX

3D Backgrounds by Tony Michael Head

Sprites made with Charas Generator
